item.title: ‘Midnights’ by Taylor Swift becomes the fastest female album to surpass 5 BILLION streams in Spotify history.

item.title: 8 years ago today, Melanie Martinez released ‘Pity Party.’

item.title: Amanda Seyfried, Tom Holland and Emmy Rossum look stunning at the premiere of their show ‘The Crowded Room.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
Fans believe Paramore may be featured on ‘Speak Now (Taylor’s Version)’ due to Hayley Williams' response to a fan who gave her a bracelet of the album:
“This is coming at a very interesting time that you’re giving me this to wear, that's all I'll say.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The album ‘Born To Die’ by Lana Del Rey had its biggest streaming day ever on Spotify yesterday, with over 6.021 million streams.
item.author: PopBase
